Name: For another day
About the game: Start to play in the open world to master the game! For another day is a world that need to be completely discovered by you. Start from zero and find your path through zombies, looking for food,equipment and guns. Keep you safe from the zombies attack, manage your hunger, thirst and blood state to keep your healthness good. Find npcs to give your character a new look, change your clothes and buy what you need. For another day is an experience where everything has to be discovered and learned by you.
